channel.title: GFX/Web Designer for Hire
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/1670eh5.jpg[/img]
I know this is not ethical but I couldn't choose a development team to post on, so I am offering my services for free. I will do all GFX required of me, and even web design if needed. I have been doing GFX for 3 years and Web design for 2. I specialize in SMF, and use Photoshop CS6, and Cinema 4D. I am efficient and work when told to.
For me to work on your server you must have a well set plan. I don't want to put my time into a project that "may" take off. I can offer small coding advice if I can remember anything for delta. But mainly I am done coding and wish to focus upon my other talents. I prefer to do Clean artwork but I can also do grunge effect which some people prefer.
If you hire me then expect to keep me around. I am not going to make you a website, and graphics for nothing. It is free real cash wise. But I inspect some type of In-Game award, such as custom rank referring to my position as GFX/Web Designer. Or Item/Gold to compensate for my work. If I make you a website then I will have admin rights on website but those rights do not need to also go to in-game unless you seem fit.
Now for some of my work.
For web design click [url=http://afoneptune.co.cc]here[/url] that is a PS3 Battlefield 3 clan I am part of and create their graphics and website.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/ne9a35.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2dael92.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/k52ld.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/21npo3s.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/spupt5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2uhsv0z.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2mhfzas.jpg[/img] [/center]
Contact me via skype: TexizGFX I will answer. Or add me via PS3: R4inb0w_R4zR

item.title: GFX/Web Designer for Hire
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

  1. Wrong section
  2. “Hiring” implies a monetary gain.
